channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nasdaq Futures Rise and Bitcoin Rallies
item.description: Dow industrials and S&P 500 futures edged up, while the Nasdaq-100 saw slightly bigger gains. Global markets were broadly lower.

item.title: Manhattan penthouse belonging to the late Paul Newman is listed for $10 million
item.description: Legendary actor and director Paul Newman’s longtime Manhattan home has been put on the market for the first time in 40 years.

item.title: European Credit Investors Prefer Euro Credit to Dollar Credit
item.description: European credit investors prefer euro-denominated credit to dollar-denominated credit due to growing expectations for more interest-rate cuts in the e...

item.title: ‘She has two financially stable children’: Does it make sense for my wealthy mother, a recent widow, to take out a $100,000 life-insurance policy?
item.description: “It was generous of our mom to offer.”

item.title: Cruise Lines Are Basking in Holiday Cheer
item.description: This “wave season” is shaping up to be not only the strongest since the pandemic but also the best ever.

item.title: ‘Yellowstone’ creator Taylor Sheridan and his $600 million Texas ranch empire
item.description: It remains to be seen whether Sheridan will part ways with any of his ranch properties in the wake of “Yellowstone” ending.

item.title: Sterling Rises After U.K. PMI Data
item.description: Sterling rose after the U.K. PMI survey showed continued expansion in private sector output and an acceleration in input price inflation, and S&P said...

item.title: Apollo CEO's Flirtation With Politics Brings New Urgency to Succession Planning
item.description: Marc Rowan is one of the few private-equity chiefs who hasn’t clearly designated an heir apparent.

item.title: Why Vera Wang may soon be corporate siblings with Bonobos, Express and Toys ‘R’ Us
item.description: The Wall Street Journal reported Sunday that WHP Global is close to a deal to purchase Vera Wang, the popular brand known for wedding dresses, jewelry...

item.title: Bitcoin hits another record high. Can it reach $150,000 this cycle?
item.description: Bitcoin continued its post-election rally Sunday, hitting a new record high above $106,000, days after President-elect Donald Trump again suggested th...
